1

Debt 2 1 - 4

Good heavens! Here's a spell that can really build Enutrofs' wealth, and in plenty of different ways. Targets affected by this spell become Indebted and lose Elemental Resistance. Cast on the same targets on the next turn, they will be Broke and drop a purse!

Normal effects

Indebted (Lvl. 1)
If the target is already Indebted:
- Broke (Lvl. 1)
- Resets the duration of Indebted

Conditions

The target must be an enemy.

Good heavens! Here's a spell that can really build Enutrofs' wealth, and in plenty of different ways. Targets affected by this spell become Indebted and lose Elemental Resistance. Cast on the same targets on the next turn, they will be Broke and drop a purse!

Normal effects

Indebted (Lvl. 1)
If the target is already Indebted:
- Broke (Lvl. 1)
- Resets the duration of Indebted

Conditions

The target must be an enemy.

Good heavens! Here's a spell that can really build Enutrofs' wealth, and in plenty of different ways. Targets affected by this spell become Indebted and lose Elemental Resistance. Cast on the same targets on the next turn, they will be Broke and drop a purse!

Normal effects

Indebted (Lvl. 1)
If the target is already Indebted:
- Broke (Lvl. 1)
- Resets the duration of Indebted

Conditions

The target must be an enemy.

Good heavens! Here's a spell that can really build Enutrofs' wealth, and in plenty of different ways. Targets affected by this spell become Indebted and lose Elemental Resistance. Cast on the same targets on the next turn, they will be Broke and drop a purse!

Normal effects

Indebted (Lvl. 1)
If the target is already Indebted:
- Broke (Lvl. 1)
- Resets the duration of Indebted

Conditions

The target must be an enemy.
